resources.string: "You weren't listed in the manifest."
That's a shame. I was really hoping to find out more about my past. I also had no luck with Niki Andris at the settlement. With any luck, the second ship holds more information about my past.
“What is Springtide Bloom?”
A celebration of nature, when the Wispyblooms appear on Aeternum. It’s when we can harmonize with the rhythms of the world and achieve peace and harmony.
“How does that help me?”
Harmonizing with the spirits of nature is both liberating and beneficial. It can shield your mind and soul. Imagine being free of the fear of Corruption, or of becoming Lost. This freedom is bliss.
“And a flower grants me this?”
The mysteries of the Wispybloom must be studied and understood. As the Bloom Herald, I seek to guide others to these truths. We should all marvel at the ethereal beauty surrounding us.
“Who are the Children of Bloom?”
We are anyone who wishes to seek the truth, to achieve peace and harmony. Our home is nature, our language is love, our sustenance is truth. We are all siblings of the Bloom.
“You seem oddly happy.”
Would you not be happy knowing such bliss? Would you not laugh, dance, and sing surrounded by such beauty? We want everyone to share what we experience.
“What exactly is a Wispy Wasp?”
A most curious insect. They appear only when the Wispyblooms blossom. They collect the enchanted nectar, but for what purpose, we do not know. They guard the flowers, and they can be deadly.
“Uh, who exactly are ‘The Folk?’”
They are the soul of nature, the heart of the earth, the voice of fate. They are as powerful as the elements and as old as the stars.
“And they’re here now?”
They are everywhere, they are everything. Surely you heard their voices, glimpsed their beauty, their truth.
“I did see… something.”
You are a Child of Bloom now. Dance, sing, laugh, for true freedom is now yours…
